So the use of graph scopes will not prevent this behavior. Is this planned to be solved ?

@Dref360 : Would you have a workaround to clear the operations still in the graph ? I would like not to clear all the operations in the graph, but only those that are created within the with tf.Graph().as_default(), tf.Session() as sess: block.

@fchollet @jart : Can you provide a solution for this problem ?
